description: Stay organized with quick task capture and clear tracking. Create, review, complete, and delete tasks to keep momentum. Filter by status to focus on what matters now.

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Creates a new task with a title and optional due date and description.

due_date.description: The due date of the task (e.g., '2023-12-31').

description.description: A detailed description of the task.

tools.name: list_tasks
tools.description: Lists all current tasks, optionally filtering by completion status.

completed.description: Filter tasks by completion status. True for completed, False for incomplete. If not provided, shows all tasks.

tools.name: update_task_status
tools.description: Updates the completion status of an existing task.

task_id.description: The ID of the task to update.

completed.description: The new completion status (True for completed, False for incomplete).

tools.name: delete_task
tools.description: Deletes a task by its ID.

task_id.description: The ID of the task to delete.
